rules.actions:
**Actions:**
â€¢ Check: Pass action
â€¢ Call: Match current bet
â€¢ Raise: Increase bet
â€¢ Fold: Forfeit hand
â€¢ All-In: Bet all chips
rules.betting_rounds:
**Betting Rounds:**
1ï¸âƒ£ Pre-flop (2 cards dealt)
2ï¸âƒ£ Flop (3 community cards)
3ï¸âƒ£ Turn (1 community card)
4ï¸âƒ£ River (1 community card)
rules.objective: **Objective:** Make the best 5-card hand from your 2 cards + 5 community cards.
rules.title: ğŸ“– Texas Hold'em Rules

help.full_text:
ğŸ´ Texas Holdâ€™em Poker Bot

ğŸ“– How to Play:
â€¢ Use /start to open the main menu
â€¢ Use /private to create or join private games
â€¢ Use /help to see this message
â€¢ Use /language to change your language

ğŸ® Game Rules:
â€¢ 2-10 players per game
â€¢ Standard Texas Holdâ€™em rules
â€¢ Betting rounds: Pre-flop, Flop, Turn, River

ğŸ’° Actions:
â€¢ Fold - Give up your hand
â€¢ Check - Pass without betting
â€¢ Call - Match current bet
â€¢ Raise - Increase the bet
â€¢ All-in - Bet everything

ğŸ† Hand Rankings (High to Low):
1. Royal Flush
2. Straight Flush
3. Four of a Kind
4. Full House
5. Flush
6. Straight
7. Three of a Kind
8. Two Pair
9. One Pair
10. High Card

Good luck! ğŸ€
